name: Basketball
description: I've been playing basketball since I was 5 years old, and have played 7 national level tournaments. Basketball has given me many unique life experiences and helped shape who I am. Also, I'm a huge fan of Steph Curry

name: Sports
description: Sports has always been something that brings me joy. The adrenaline you get from competeing, is something that can't be matched. I love playing football, volleyball and racket sports.

name: Reading
description: I love reading both fiction and non-fiction. Atomic habits and the Habit of winning were game-changers for me. My favorite fiction authors are Dan Brown, Stephen King and Brandon Sanderson.

name: Traveling
description: I love to travel and explore new places. I've been to over 20 cities in my life (mostly for tournaments) and hope to visit many more and soak up different cultures.

name: Cooking
description: Good food = Good life. Masterchef inspired me to begin cooking. I enjoy experimenting in the kitchen and learning new recipes.
